revisionDesc.change: Added via github because the file was corrupt in the editor.
Vote - AcceptWithModification - l. 12 add : after Total l. 13 add ... after Psoïs Note: line numbers do not show right (general problem)
Submit - Enter edition and translation according to Mohamed G. Elmaghrabi, "Three Receipts for Beer Tax from Hibeh", Zeitschrift für Papyrologie und Epigraphik, Bd. 186 (2013), pp. 237-243

div.p: (1st hand) By tenant - - - (sown) with wheat 4 1/16 1/64 arouras (sown) with flax 1/8 1/32 aroura (sown) with barley ½ 1/8 1/16 aroura By Kalthon (?) (sown) with flax ¼ aroura By . . . . .is (sown) with wheat 5 arouras of pasture 4 1/16 arouras (sown) with flax 1 ¼ 1/8 1/16 1/64 aroura (sown) with barley ½ ¼ 1/8 1/16 1/32 arouras Total: 16 ½ 1/8 1/32 arouras (2nd hand) By tenant Psoïs ... (3rd hand) Total: of wheat 59 artabas and 8 choenices of barley 23 artabas and 1 choenix in half: of wheat 29 ½ artabas and 4 choenices of barley 11 ½ artabas Translation: P.Leid.Inst. 1 54
